Name: Giotto Jacket Crusader Edition Purple Pinstripe
Description:
Carrying Capacity: 1K ÂµSCU

Fiore elevates the typical suit jacket with the Giotto. Subtle and stylish flourishes include light lines running down the left lapel and a strip of accent fabric along the arm seams that connect across the back of the jacket. The end result is an elegant and inspired addition to any wardrobe.

The Crusader Edition was made specifically for employees of Crusader Industries.
